mapper.select: update INSBSupplementaryinfo set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},riskid = #{riskid},itemname = #{itemname},itemcode = #{itemcode},itemtype = #{itemtype},isusing = #{isusing},isquotemust = #{isquotemust},inputtype = #{inputtype},optional = #{optional},isunderwriteusing = #{isunderwriteusing},isunderwritemust = #{isunderwritemust} where id = #{id}
